A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the first movie I've ever seen in a theatre where I pulled my phone out of my pocket mid-way through to check the time.  It's not only a bad star Wars movie\, pooping on all established lore and character development\, but it's a terrible movie in general.  Plot holes are everywhere\, there is no character or plot development\, and over an hour of the movie is completely pointless and goes nowhere.  Nothing in this movie makes any sense\, nor does its high ratings from \"critics\,\" who clearly need to re-evaluate their career choices.
